desired_command.label: Chat Command
desired_command.tooltip: Command that users will use when they want to transfer currency

minimum_permissions.label: Minimum Permissions
minimum_permissions.tooltip: Command that users will use when they want to transfer currency

successful_transfer_message.label: Transfer Success Message
successful_transfer_message.tooltip: Chat message will be sent on successful transfer of currency. 0-user, 1-amount, 2-currency, 3 target

not_enough_funds_message.value: Sorry {0}, you do not have enough {1}.
not_enough_funds_message.label: Not Enough Funds Message
not_enough_funds_message.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user doesnt have enough funds. 0-user, 1-currency

invalid_amount_message.value: Sorry {0}, {1} is not a valid amount.
invalid_amount_message.label: Not Enough Funds Message
invalid_amount_message.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user doesnt have enough funds. 0-user, 1-amount

no_target_message.value: Sorry {0}, but you didn't say who to send the {1} to.
no_target_message.label: No Target Message
no_target_message.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user doesnt specify a target. 0-user 1-currency

invalid_target_message.label: No Target Message
invalid_target_message.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user specifies an invalid target. 0-user 1-target
